seed_pair.target: It's a good idea to try and breathe slowly.
seed_pair.known: Es una buena idea intentar respirar despacio.
Cuando sea que te sientas enojado.

seed_pair.target: Whoever said it would be difficult was absolutely right.
seed_pair.known: Quien sea que dijo que sería difícil tenía absolutamente razón.

seed_pair.target: It's your turn to take the clean clothes upstairs.
seed_pair.known: Es tu turno de llevar la ropa limpia arriba.

seed_pair.target: The dog is dirty and wet.
seed_pair.known: El perro está sucio y mojado.

seed_pair.target: Because he has been playing in the mud.
seed_pair.known: Porque ha estado jugando en el barro.

seed_pair.target: I am feeling sad at the moment.
seed_pair.known: Me estoy sintiendo triste en este momento.

seed_pair.target: Because I have got to be quiet.
